author: olivito
body:
- support for a relative, track-only isolation cut for muons at HLT
- support for track isolation for tracker muons at HLT

Existing behaviors are preserved as defaults.  Due to an interface change, the following needs to be changed in the current HLT configuration:

Change "hltL3Muons"  "hltL3MuonCandidates" for the following objects:
- hltL3MuonCombRelIsolationsIso1p0
- hltL3MuonCombRelIsolations
- hltL3CaloMuonCorrectedIsolations

Also adding 1 parameter to ConfDB: 
"UseCaloIso" for L3MuonCombinedRelativeIsolationProducer (default = True)
title: hlt muon track iso
